data.hoverText: 可与单数或复数动词连用的可数名词

data.enText: a group of members of the public who listen to the facts of a case in a court and decide whether or not sb is guilty of a crime

data.chText: 陪审团已作出有罪裁定。
data.enText: The jury has/have returned a verdict of guilty.
the right to trial by jury

data.chText: （比赛的）评判委员会，裁判委员会
data.enText: a group of people who decide who is the winner of a competition
the jury is (still) out on sth
used when you are saying that sth is still not certain

word_means: 评判委员会，裁判委员会
simple_means.memory_skill: jur 发誓；法律 + y 表人 → 使用法律进行裁决的人们 → 陪审团

means: (比赛的)评判委员会，裁判委员会

ex.zh: 陪审团宣布；评判委员会宣布
公正的陪审团；公正的评判委员会

data.enText: the jury is (still) out on sth
used when you are saying that sth is still not certain

tr: a body of citizens sworn to give a true verdict according to the evidence presented in a court of law
a committee appointed to judge a competition

value.def: In a court of law, the jury is the group of people who have been chosen from the general public to listen to the facts about a crime and to decide whether the person accused is guilty or not.

example.ex: The jury convicted Mr Hampson of all offences.
example.tran: 陪审团裁定汉普森先生全部罪名成立。

value.def: A jury is a group of people who choose the winner of a competition.

example.ex: I am not surprised that the Booker Prize jury included it on their shortlist.
example.tran: 我毫不惊讶布克奖评委会将其列在入选名单中。

value.tran: （竞赛的）评判委员会，裁判委员会

value.def: If you say that the jury is out or that the jury is still out on a particular subject, you mean that people in general have still not made a decision or formed an opinion about that subject.

example.ex: The jury is out on whether or not this is true...
example.tran: 这是否属实仍未得出定论。

example.ex: The jury is still out on what kind of solutions we might undertake.
example.tran: 尚未确定我们可能采取何种解决办法。

value.tran: （某事）悬而未决，仍未达成定论

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to swear, law 发誓；法律
rootsaffixes.title: jur, juris

partsOfSpeech.dec: ab 离去 + jure → 发誓离开 → 发誓放弃
con 共同 + jur 发誓；法律 + e → 一起发誓 → 恳求〔别人〕
in 不 + jur 发誓；法律 + y 表行为 → 不法行为
jur 发誓；法律 + al …的 → 法制的，法律上的
juris 发誓；法律 + dict 说，命令 + ion 表名词 → 法律的说法 → 司法权
juris 发誓；法律 + prud 小心 + ence 表行为 → 认真学法的行为 → 法律学
jur 发誓；法律 + or 表人 → 使用法律进行裁决的人 → 陪审团的一员
jur 发誓；法律 + y 表人 → 使用法律进行裁决的人们 → 陪审团
per 假 + jur 发誓；法律 + y 表名词 → 假誓
